doctor.name: Dr. Sipon Kumar Das
doctor.specialty: Burn, Plastic Surgery, Reconstructive & Cosmetic Surgery Specialist
doctor.workplace: Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn & Plastic Surgery
doctor.info: Dr. Sipon Kumar Das is a Plastic Surgeon in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Plastic Surgery). He is a Consultant, Plastic Surgery at Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn & Plastic Surgery. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shafique Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Sipon Kumar Das at Shafique Hospital, Pabna is 9am to 5pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: Khairul Tower, Narikel Bagan Road, Kalachad Para, Pabna

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Shariful Islam Sumon
doctor.workplace: Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn & Plastic Surgery
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shariful Islam Sumon is a Plastic Surgeon in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery), MS (Plastic Surgery). He is a Consultant, Burn & Plastic Surgery at Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn & Plastic Surgery. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shimla Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Shariful Islam Sumon at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 9am to 4pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: Shimla Tower, Thana Mor, Hospital Road, Pabna
